isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 18 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14618 AND RTLO-16618 SERIES - INSTALL - MAINSHAFT AND AUXILIARY DRIVE GEAR ASSEMBLIES

svcproc.title: MAINSHAFT AND AUXILIARY DRIVE GEAR ASSEMBLIES

step1.para: Move the reverse gear to the rear as far as possible, meshing teeth of the gear with those of the reverse idler gears ( Figure 266).

figure.caption: Figure 266. Move Reverse Gear to Rear

step1.para: Align the external splines of the spacer with clutching teeth of the reverse gear and move the spacer forward on the mainshaft and into reverse gear ( Figure 267).

figure.caption: Figure 267. Move Spacer Forward on Mainshaft

step1.para: Install the snap ring in the hub of the reverse gear and move the reverse gear forward on the mainshaft and into the proper position in the case ( Figure 268).

figure.caption: Figure 268. Install Snap Ring in Hub of Reverse Gear

step1.para: Install the snap ring on the mainshaft snap ring groove ( Figure 269).

figure.caption: Figure 269. Install Snap Ring on Mainshaft Snap Ring Groove

step1.para: Install the splined washer on the mainshaft splines behind the reverse gear ( Figure 270).

figure.caption: Figure 270. Install Splined Washer on Mainshaft Splines Behind Reverse Gear

step1.para: Re-install the front auxiliary drive gear assembly on the rear of the mainshaft ( Figure 271). Use a flanged end driver and maul to set bearing in the case bore.

figure.caption: Figure 271. Re-Install Front Auxiliary Drive Gear Assembly on Rear of Mainshaft

step1.para: Align the six bolt holes in the retainer with the tapped holes in the case and install the bolts ( Figure 272). Tighten to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 N·m) and lockwire the bolts in groups of three.

figure.caption: Figure 272. Align Bolt Holes in Retainer With Tapped Holes in Case

step1.para: Install the splined washer on the mainshaft splines behind the auxiliary drive gear ( Figure 273).

figure.caption: Figure 273. Install Splined Washer on Mainshaft Splines

step1.para: Install the snap ring in the groove at the end of the mainshaft ( Figure 274).

figure.caption: Figure 274. Install Snap Ring in Groove at End of Mainshaft
